name: DodgeIt (tankpillow)
description:
DodgeIt is a game all about dodging pellets. Be warned however, this game is very difficult. 

Comment how far you got in the game.

PLEASE NOTE: This game is still in development, their maybe bugs. If you find a bug in the game please comment the bug and how to reproduce it.

SUPPORT: If you choose you can support the game  and its development with a $2.00 or more donation.
